languages.text: "Головные боли у Главного кормчего, вызванные неисправностью имплантов, периодические несварения у фактотума, боевые ранения Мастера дисциплины, совершенно не летальные..." {n}Он лениво загибает пальцы.{/n} "Скучные случаи, которые я вынужден вести исключительно из-за должности Хирургеона маджорис. Хотя бы Инфернус-мастер не тратит мое время и просто забирает мази от ожогов".

traits.locale_text: "Головные боли у Главного кормчего, вызванные неисправностью имплантов, периодические несварения у фактотума, боевые ранения Мастера дисциплины, совершенно не летальные..." {n}Он лениво загибает пальцы.{/n} "Скучные случаи, которые я вынужден вести исключительно из-за должности Хирургеона маджорис. Хотя бы Инфернус-мастер не тратит мое время и просто забирает мази от ожогов".

languages.text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."
languages.original_text: "Головные боли у Главного кормчего, вызванные неисправностью имплантов, периодические несварения у фактотума, боевые ранения Мастера дисциплины, совершенно не летальные..." {n}Он лениво загибает пальцы.{/n} "Скучные случаи, которые я вынужден вести исключительно из-за должности Хирургеона маджорис. Хотя бы Инфернус-мастер не тратит мое время и просто забирает мази от ожогов".

At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

"The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

languages.text: "Die auf seine fehlerhaften Implantate zurückzuführenden Kopfschmerzen des Hauptsteuermanns, die gelegentlichen Verdauungsstörungen des Hoch-Faktotums, die Kampfwunden der Waffenmeisterin, die schwerlich als lebensbedrohlich bezeichnet werden können ..." {n}Forius zählt die Offiziere herablassend mit seinen Fingern auf.{/n} "Geistlose Fälle, mit denen ich mich als Chirurgeum Majoris befassen muss. Immerhin vergeudet der Infernus-Meister nicht meine Zeit, sondern holt sich einfach nur Salben für seine Verbrennungen."
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

traits.locale_text: "Die auf seine fehlerhaften Implantate zurückzuführenden Kopfschmerzen des Hauptsteuermanns, die gelegentlichen Verdauungsstörungen des Hoch-Faktotums, die Kampfwunden der Waffenmeisterin, die schwerlich als lebensbedrohlich bezeichnet werden können ..." {n}Forius zählt die Offiziere herablassend mit seinen Fingern auf.{/n} "Geistlose Fälle, mit denen ich mich als Chirurgeum Majoris befassen muss. Immerhin vergeudet der Infernus-Meister nicht meine Zeit, sondern holt sich einfach nur Salben für seine Verbrennungen."

languages.text: « Les céphalées du maître timonier induites par ses implants défaillants, les troubles digestifs occasionnels du haut factotum, les plaies superficielles reçues au combat par la capitaine d'armes... {n}Pour chaque officier qu'il mentionne, Forius plie un doigt avec dédain.{/n} Autant de petits maux insignifiants qu'il me faut gérer en tant que chirurgeon majoris. Au moins, le maître-infernus a le bon goût de ne pas me faire perdre mon temps et se contente de passer de temps à autre récupérer les onguents nécessaires au traitement de ses brûlures. »
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

traits.locale_text: « Les céphalées du maître timonier induites par ses implants défaillants, les troubles digestifs occasionnels du haut factotum, les plaies superficielles reçues au combat par la capitaine d'armes... {n}Pour chaque officier qu'il mentionne, Forius plie un doigt avec dédain.{/n} Autant de petits maux insignifiants qu'il me faut gérer en tant que chirurgeon majoris. Au moins, le maître-infernus a le bon goût de ne pas me faire perdre mon temps et se contente de passer de temps à autre récupérer les onguents nécessaires au traitement de ses brûlures. »

languages.text: «Las migrañas del maestro timonel que le provocan sus implantes defectuosos, la ocasional indigestión del Sumo Factótum, las heridas de guerra de la maestra de armas que apenas revisten gravedad...». {n}Forius extiende un dedo con gesto desdeñoso por cada oficial al que menciona.{/n} «Casos banales que me veo obligado a atender como Cirujano Majoris. Al menos el maestro de infernus sabe valorar mi tiempo y se limita a pedir ungüentos para sus quemaduras».
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

traits.locale_text: «Las migrañas del maestro timonel que le provocan sus implantes defectuosos, la ocasional indigestión del Sumo Factótum, las heridas de guerra de la maestra de armas que apenas revisten gravedad...». {n}Forius extiende un dedo con gesto desdeñoso por cada oficial al que menciona.{/n} «Casos banales que me veo obligado a atender como Cirujano Majoris. Al menos el maestro de infernus sabe valorar mi tiempo y se limita a pedir ungüentos para sus quemaduras».

languages.text: 「マスター・ヘルムスマンの頭痛はインプラントの不具合によるもので、ハイ・ファクトタムは時折消化不良を起こし、マスター・アット・アームはよく火傷をされる…」{n}フォーリアスは士官の名前を挙げるたび、嫌そうに指を折っていく。{/n}「私がチラージョン・マジョリスとして治療しなければならない、下らない症例です。まあ、インフェルヌス・マスターは私の時間を無駄にはせず、火傷の難航をただ取りに来るだけではありますが」
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヘルムスマンの頭痛はインプラントの不具合によるもので、ハイ・ファクトタムは時折消化不良を起こし、マスター・アット・アームはよく火傷をされる…」{n}フォーリアスは士官の名前を挙げるたび、嫌そうに指を折っていく。{/n}「私がチラージョン・マジョリスとして治療しなければならない、下らない症例です。まあ、インフェルヌス・マスターは私の時間を無駄にはせず、火傷の難航をただ取りに来るだけではありますが」

languages.text: “舵手长由于植入物出了问题而时常头痛，高阶顾问偶尔会发生消化不良的情况，而戒律大师浑身上下都是伤，尽管不至于威胁到她的性命……”{n}弗里乌斯每提及一名军官，便轻蔑地伸出一根手指。{/n}“身为船医总管，处理这些无聊的病症是我的份内职责。不过，至少控火大师从来不会浪费我的时间，他每次都是拿了烧伤药膏就直接走人。”
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."

traits.locale_text: “舵手长由于植入物出了问题而时常头痛，高阶顾问偶尔会发生消化不良的情况，而戒律大师浑身上下都是伤，尽管不至于威胁到她的性命……”{n}弗里乌斯每提及一名军官，便轻蔑地伸出一根手指。{/n}“身为船医总管，处理这些无聊的病症是我的份内职责。不过，至少控火大师从来不会浪费我的时间，他每次都是拿了烧伤药膏就直接走人。”

languages.text: "Başserdümen'in sorunlu implantlarından kaynaklı baş ağrıları, Arşıkâhya'nın zaman zaman meydana gelen hazım sorunları, Silahtar'ın hayati tehlike taşıdığı pek söylenemeyecek çatışma yaraları..." {n}Forius, sözünü ettiği subayları bir kenara koyarcasına parmağını büküyor.{/n} "Başcerrah olarak ilgilenmekle yükümlü olduğum yavan sorunlar. En azından İtfa Üstadı, zamanımı boşa harcamıyor ve yalnızca yanıkları için merhem almaya geliyor."
languages.original_text: "The Master Helmsman's headaches caused by his faulty implants, the High Factotum's occasional indigestion, the Master-at-Arms's combat wounds that can hardly be considered life-threatening..." {n}Forius folds a finger dismissively for every officer he mentions.{/n} "Vapid cases that I am obligated to manage as Chirurgeon Majoris. At least the Infernus Master does not waste my time and simply comes to pick up ointments for his burns."
